HTTP_PROXY.title: HTTP_PROXY
HTTP_PROXY.description:
The full URL for the proxy.
E.g. "http://user:pass@127.0.0.1:8080/"

TUNING.title: TUNING
TUNING.description:
Nikto tuning options to select specific test types.
1=Interesting files, 2=Misconfiguration, 3=Information Disclosure,
4=XSS/Injection, 5=File Retrieval (webroot), 6=DoS, 7=File Retrieval (server),
8=Command Execution, 9=SQL Injection, a=Auth Bypass, b=Software ID, c=Remote Include.
Default: 3b (Information Disclosure + Software Identification)

MAX_TIME.title: MAX_TIME
MAX_TIME.description: Maximum scan duration in seconds. Default: 600 (10 minutes)
